description:
Leader of the Innocent, although Kashim King keeps him unaware of what is actually happening. Jiron and other members of the Solt organization desire to speak to him and they eventually take him from Kashim`s clutches, revealing the truth to him. Arthur`s good looks cause many of the female members of Solt to develop a crush on him. In bad health outside of the domes, Arthur nonetheless works to communicate to the Innocent that it is time to hand over the planet to the civilians and assists Jiron and the others in fighting against Kashim.
He sacrifices himself in order to return Elchi to normal, taking on the evil personality that had been implanted in her and jumps out of the Iron Gear to his death.
name: Arthur Rank
